mapper.select: SELECT CHALL_IDX, CHALL_TITLE, CHALL_DESCRIPTION, CHALL_CATEGORY_IDX, MIN_PARTICIPATION_TIME, TOTAL_CLEAR_TIME, MAX_PARTICIPANTS, CHALL_START_TIME, CHALL_END_TIME, CHALL_CREATED_AT, CHALL_STATE, DURATION, USER_JOIN FROM CHALL_TABLE WHERE CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx} AND CHALL_STATE != 'END'

SELECT v.START_TIME AS startTime, v.END_TIME AS endTime, TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, v.START_TIME, v.END_TIME) AS elapsedMinutes, cj. ACTIVITY AS activity FROM VERIFY_TABLE v JOIN CHALL_JOIN cj ON v.CHALL_IDX = cj.CHALL_IDX AND v.USER_IDX = cj.USER_IDX WHERE v.CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx} AND v.USER_IDX = #{userIdx} ORDER BY v.START_TIME DESC

SELECT cj.CHALL_JOIN_IDX, cj.CHALL_IDX, cj.USER_IDX, u.USER_NICK AS userNick, cj.ACTIVITY, cj.ACTIVITY_TIME FROM CHALL_JOIN cj JOIN USER_TABLE u ON cj.USER_IDX = u.USER_IDX WHERE cj.CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHALL_JOIN (CHALL_IDX, USER_IDX, ACTIVITY, ACTIVITY_TIME) VALUES (#{challIdx}, #{userIdx}, #{activity}, #{activityTime})
mapper.select: SELECT CHALL_JOIN_IDX, CHALL_IDX, USER_IDX, ACTIVITY FROM CHALL_JOIN WHERE CHALL_IDX = #{challIdx} AND USER_IDX = #{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE CHALL_TABLE SET CHALL_STATE = '종료됨' WHERE CHALL_STATE = '진행중' AND CHALL_END_TIME <= #{now}
